amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to provide $5 million to conduct an independent study, including a survey of participants, on the impact of the additional benefits provided through disaster nutrition assistance on the food insecurity, health status, and well-being of program participants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
